t:test_case.steps: 1. Login to admin account 2. Create a mail account

t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Adding flag to the 1st messages 2. Mark 2nd messages as read 3. Reply to the 3rd mail 4. forward the 4th mail

Verify the results are correct for query using to: and status

Verify the results are correct for query using ccand status

Verify the results are correct for query using ccand status (by conversation)

t:property.name: mail.content

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify the results are correct for query using ccand status
Verify the results are correct for query using cc and status (by conversation)
Verify the results are correct for query using is anywhere and status
Verify the results are correct for query using is:anywhere and status (by conversation)

To verify bug 6422 "(to:foo or to:bar) OR is:unread/read query returns proper results"
